actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A resolution to approve the amendment to Department of Energy Standby Conservation Plan numbered one (Department of Energy Standby Conservation Plan numbered four).

summary.text: Expresses the approval of the Senate of the Department of Energy Standby Conservation Plan No. 4 (relating to weekend gasoline sales restrictions).

titles.title: A resolution to approve the amendment to Department of Energy Standby Conservation Plan numbered one (Department of Energy Standby Conservation Plan numbered four).
